alert.note: Alert for Miller; Morgan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 03 at 4:18AM CDT until August 03 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northern Miller County in central Missouri... Northern Morgan County in central Missouri... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 418 AM CDT, Department of highways reported flash flooding across the warned area, especially across northern Morgan County. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Department of Highways. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. This includes the following low water crossings... Richland Creek at Blue Bird Road, Gabriel Creek at Highway BB and Saline Creek at Square Line Road. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
